name: Guacamole Cream
description: This is next-level guac! Don’t let the name fool you—this “cream” is totally dairy-free! It’s all about that smooth texture we crave, with luscious avocado blended with the sweetness of peppers, an aromatic punch of garlic, and the right amount of kick from chilies in the mix. Serve in a squeeze bottle, cruet, or something with a pour spout to easily drizzle over tacos.

ingredients.name: Guacamole Dip Mix or Poco Picante Salsa Mix

preparation: Place the avocado flesh, lime juice, mayonnaise, water, and dip mix into a food processor. Blend until smooth. If your sauce is too thick, add more water, 1⁄2 tbsp at a time, to thin it to your desired consistency.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
